lang.dontShowMeThisMessageAgain: Don't show me this message again
lang.directions: Click on a red hotspot in the schematic or on an item in the Equipment menu to see corresponding lubricant information. To view more of the schematic, click and drag with your mouse or use the arrow keys on your keyboard.
lang.touchModeQuestion: It appears you’re using a touch-enabled device. Would you prefer to use the touch-optimized interface?

products.name: Mobilgrease™ XTC
products.information: Grease for use in high-speed coupling applications
products.benefits: Helps reduce leakage, helping improve reliability and coupling protection; helps reduce coupling wear, even when misaligned; long grease life and relubrication intervals; excellent performance even in aqueous environments

products.name: Mobilux™ EP 111
products.information: High-performance grease primarily for all AGMA CG3 couplings
products.benefits: Excellent viscometrics and wear protection help promote long coupling life; helps resist rust and corrosion and maintain performance even in the presence of water; excellent high-temperature stability helps promote long grease life and relubrication intervals

products.name: Mobil SHC™ 500 Series
products.information: Hydraulic oils for high-pressure vane, piston and gear pumps
products.benefits: Wide temperature-range performance; assures equipment protection at cold startup temperatures; helps protect system components at high operating temperatures; long service intervals; helps promote cleaner system and reduce close-tolerance valve sticking; excellent filterability

products.name: Mobil DTE 10 Excel™ Series
products.information: Hydraulic oils for high-pressure, industrial and mobile equipment hydraulic systems
products.benefits: Helps reduce system deposits leading to reduced machine maintenance and increased component life; helps reduce wear and protects pumps and components for long equipment life; helps prevent aeration and cavitation damage in low-residence time systems

products.name: Mobil DTE™ 20 Series
products.information: Premium-performance hydraulic oils for hydraulic systems using high-pressure, high-output pumps
products.benefits: Helps reduce wear and protects against corrosion; maintains performance features even under severe conditions and extended drain intervals; helps improve system cleanliness; provides long oil, filter and equipment life; helps reduce the negative effects of moisture in systems

components.name: Lube System Main and Pitman - Grease & Oil

subcomponents.name: Lube System Main and Pitman - Oil

products.name: Mobil SHC™ Gear Series
products.information: Fully synthetic industrial gear oils for gears and bearings
products.benefits: Helps extend gear and bearing life in enclosed gear drives operating under extreme conditions of load, speed and temperature; compared to conventional oils, helps extend oil life and drain intervals and reduce oil consumption, which can lower maintenance costs; helps promote trouble-free operation at high temperatures or in applications subject to water contamination

products.name: Mobilgear™ 600 XP Series
products.information: Gear oils for all types of enclosed gear drives with circulation or splash lubrication systems
products.benefits: Problem-free operation in the presence of water contamination or in equipment prone to oil foaming; enhanced gear-wear protection from micropitting; improved bearing-wear protection; outstanding compatibility with a range of seal materials

subcomponents.name: Lube System Main and Pitman - Grease

products.name: Mobilith SHC™ Series
products.information: High-performance greases for a wide variety of applications at extreme temperatures
products.benefits: Excellent protection against wear, rust and corrosion; provides operating viscosity at high and low temperatures; outstanding thermal stability and oxidation resistance to help extend service and bearing life with long relubrication intervals

products.name: Mobilgrease XHP™ Series
products.information: Lithium complex greases for a wide variety of applications and severe operating conditions
products.benefits: Superb resistance to water washout and spray-off helps assure proper lubrication and protection even in some of the most severe water-exposure conditions; excellent grease tenacity helps reduce leakage and extend relubrication intervals for reduced maintenance requirements; outstanding rust and corrosion resistance

products.name: Mobilgrease XHP™ Mine Series
products.information: Lithium complex greases for extra-heavy-duty off-highway and mining equipment
products.benefits: Superb equipment protection and potential equipment life extension even in severe operating conditions; provides excellent low-temperature pumpability and startup performance; long relubrication intervals

products.name: Mobilith SHC™ Series
products.information: High-performance greases for a wide variety of applications at extreme temperatures
products.benefits: Excellent protection against wear, rust and corrosion; provides operating viscosity at high and low temperatures; outstanding thermal stability and oxidation resistance to help extend service and bearing life with long relubrication intervals

products.name: Mobilgrease XHP™ Series
products.information: Lithium complex greases for a wide variety of applications and severe operating conditions
products.benefits: Superb resistance to water washout and spray-off helps assure proper lubrication and protection even in some of the most severe water-exposure conditions; excellent grease tenacity helps reduce leakage and extend relubrication intervals for reduced maintenance requirements; outstanding rust and corrosion resistance

products.name: Mobilgrease XHP™ Mine Series
products.information: Lithium complex greases for extra-heavy-duty off-highway and mining equipment
products.benefits: Superb equipment protection and potential equipment life extension even in severe operating conditions; provides excellent low-temperature pumpability and startup performance; long relubrication intervals

products.name: Mobil SHC™ Gear Series
products.information: Fully synthetic industrial gear oils for gears and bearings
products.benefits: Helps extend gear and bearing life in enclosed gear drives operating under extreme conditions of load, speed and temperature; compared to conventional oils, helps extend oil life and drain intervals and reduce oil consumption, which can lower maintenance costs; helps promote trouble-free operation at high temperatures or in applications subject to water contamination

products.name: Mobilgear™ 600 XP Series
products.information: Gear oils for all types of enclosed gear drives with circulation or splash lubrication systems
products.benefits: Problem-free operation in the presence of water contamination or in equipment prone to oil foaming; enhanced gear-wear protection from micropitting; improved bearing-wear protection; outstanding compatibility with a range of seal materials

products.name: Mobil SHC™ Gear Series
products.information: Fully synthetic industrial gear oils for gears and bearings
products.benefits: Helps extend gear and bearing life in enclosed gear drives operating under extreme conditions of load, speed and temperature; compared to conventional oils, helps extend oil life and drain intervals and reduce oil consumption, which can lower maintenance costs; helps promote trouble-free operation at high temperatures or in applications subject to water contamination

products.name: Mobilgear™ 600 XP Series
products.information: Gear oils for all types of enclosed gear drives with circulation or splash lubrication systems
products.benefits: Problem-free operation in the presence of water contamination or in equipment prone to oil foaming; enhanced gear-wear protection from micropitting; improved bearing-wear protection; outstanding compatibility with a range of seal materials

products.name: Mobil SHC™ 600 Series
products.information: Gear and bearing oils for a wide range of applications
products.benefits: Helps improve gear efficiency, reducing power consumption; promotes long parts life; outstanding resistance to oxidation and sludging, especially at high temperatures; exceptional resistance to rusting and corrosion; excellent antiwear, demulsibility, foam control and air release; multimetal compatibility

products.name: Mobil DTE™ Oil Named Series
products.information: Premium-performance circulating lubricants for applications including steam and hydro turbine sets
products.benefits: Very high level of chemical and thermal stability and resistance to sludging and varnishing; long oil-charge life in circulation systems; excellent water-release properties; very good antiwear protection; long-term protection against rust and corrosion

products.name: Mobil SHC™ Gear Series
products.information: Fully synthetic industrial gear oils for gears and bearings
products.benefits: Helps extend gear and bearing life in enclosed gear drives operating under extreme conditions of load, speed and temperature; compared to conventional oils, helps extend oil life and drain intervals and reduce oil consumption, which can lower maintenance costs; helps promote trouble-free operation at high temperatures or in applications subject to water contamination

products.name: Mobilgear™ 600 XP Series
products.information: Gear oils for all types of enclosed gear drives with circulation or splash lubrication systems
products.benefits: Problem-free operation in the presence of water contamination or in equipment prone to oil foaming; enhanced gear-wear protection from micropitting; improved bearing-wear protection; outstanding compatibility with a range of seal materials

products.name: Mobil SHC™ 600 Series
products.information: Gear and bearing oils for a wide range of applications
products.benefits: Helps improve gear efficiency, reducing power consumption; promotes long parts life; outstanding resistance to oxidation and sludging, especially at high temperatures; exceptional resistance to rusting and corrosion; excellent antiwear, demulsibility, foam control and air release; multimetal compatibility

products.name: Mobilith SHC™ 100
products.information: High-performance grease for electric motors and other higher speed applications
products.benefits: Helps protect against wear, rust and corrosion, promoting long bearing life; strong resistance to water contamination; excellent structural stability can lead to long service life; powerful adhesion; low temperature pumpability and low starting and running torque

products.name: Mobil Polyrex™ EM
products.information: Super-premium grease for electric-motor bearings
products.benefits: Helps improve bearing performance and protection for long electric-motor life; outstanding long-life, high-temperature lubrication of ball and roller bearings, particularly in sealed-for-life applications; increased durability versus conventional polyurea greases when subjected to mechanical shear forces

products.name: Mobil SHC™ Gear Series
products.information: Fully synthetic industrial gear oils for gears and bearings
products.benefits: Helps extend gear and bearing life in enclosed gear drives operating under extreme conditions of load, speed and temperature; compared to conventional oils, helps extend oil life and drain intervals and reduce oil consumption, which can lower maintenance costs; helps promote trouble-free operation at high temperatures or in applications subject to water contamination

products.name: Mobilgear™ 600 XP Series
products.information: Gear oils for all types of enclosed gear drives with circulation or splash lubrication systems
products.benefits: Problem-free operation in the presence of water contamination or in equipment prone to oil foaming; enhanced gear-wear protection from micropitting; improved bearing-wear protection; outstanding compatibility with a range of seal materials

products.name: Mobil SHC™ 600 Series
products.information: Gear and bearing oils for a wide range of applications
products.benefits: Helps improve gear efficiency, reducing power consumption; promotes long parts life; outstanding resistance to oxidation and sludging, especially at high temperatures; exceptional resistance to rusting and corrosion; excellent antiwear, demulsibility, foam control and air release; multimetal compatibility

products.name: Mobilgrease™ XTC
products.information: Grease for use in high-speed coupling applications
products.benefits: Helps reduce leakage, helping improve reliability and coupling protection; helps reduce coupling wear, even when misaligned; long grease life and relubrication intervals; excellent performance even in aqueous environments

products.name: Mobilux™ EP 111
products.information: High-performance grease primarily for all AGMA CG3 couplings
products.benefits: Excellent viscometrics and wear protection help promote long coupling life; helps resist rust and corrosion and maintain performance even in the presence of water; excellent high-temperature stability helps promote long grease life and relubrication intervals

products.information: Gear and bearing oils for a wide range of applications
products.benefits: Helps improve gear efficiency, reducing power consumption; promotes long parts life; outstanding resistance to oxidation and sludging, especially at high temperatures; exceptional resistance to rusting and corrosion; excellent antiwear, demulsibility, foam control and air release; multimetal compatibility

components.name: Open Gear Drive, Electric Motor & Mill Trunion Bearings

products.name: Mobil SHC™ Gear Series
products.information: Fully synthetic industrial gear oils for gears and bearings
products.benefits: Helps extend gear and bearing life in enclosed gear drives operating under extreme conditions of load, speed and temperature; compared to conventional oils, helps extend oil life and drain intervals and reduce oil consumption, which can lower maintenance costs; helps promote trouble-free operation at high temperatures or in applications subject to water contamination

products.name: Mobil Dynagear™ Series
products.information: All-season, multi-purpose grease-base lubricant for open gears
products.benefits: Excellent gear protection — potentially leading to extended equipment life and lower maintenance costs; trouble-free operation at high temperatures or in applications subject to water contamination; helps protect over-extended temperature range

products.name: Mobiltac™ NC Series
products.information: Non-leaded, diluent-type, heavy-bodied lubricants for open gear and mining applications
products.benefits: Provides significantly improved environmental and performance benefits over older diluent-type technologies; excellent protection of gear teeth and other machine elements under boundary lubrication conditions; easy start-up at low ambient; maintains superb protection in wet environments

products.name: Geargard™ HVS
products.information: High-viscosity semi-synthetic open gear fluids primarily intended for heavily loaded, low-and medium-speed gears in boundary lubrication conditions
products.benefits: Long gear life resulting from excellent load-carrying, antiwear and tackiness properties; outstanding performance under severe high- and low-temperature conditions; clear product allows visual inspection of gears in operation

products.name: Mobilith SHC™ 100
products.information: High-performance grease for electric motors and other higher speed applications
products.benefits: Helps protect against wear, rust and corrosion, promoting long bearing life; strong resistance to water contamination; excellent structural stability can lead to long service life; powerful adhesion; low temperature pumpability and low starting and running torque

products.name: Mobil Polyrex™ EM
products.information: Super-premium grease for electric-motor bearings
products.benefits: Helps improve bearing performance and protection for long electric-motor life; outstanding long-life, high-temperature lubrication of ball and roller bearings, particularly in sealed-for-life applications; increased durability versus conventional polyurea greases when subjected to mechanical shear forces
